credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Herman Miller Summer Picnic, 1985
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
medium: Silkscreen with lacquer finish on wove paper
description: The background is a red-and-white  tablecloth with checker and clover patterns, on which is arranged a white plate with blue stripes, holding green grapes. Yellow daisies are in the lower right corner, while in the upper right, are three ants. The plate with grapes is inscribed with "HERMAN MILLER SUMMER PICNIC 1985".
name: Poster
